title: Replace X social link with YouTube in Follow Us section

requirements.text: In the "Follow Us" social links section of the Contact page (frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx), remove the existing "X" (Twitter) social link and replace it with a YouTube social link that points to this exact URL: https://youtube.com/@myplaceatqueretaro?si=FI8rt31Wp4dxLMY2.

quotes: in the same section (Follow us), please remove the "X" link for such social media, since i do not have a channel there.
with YouTube please and linked to " https://youtube.com/@myplaceatqueretaro?si=FI8rt31Wp4dxLMY2"

acceptanceCriteria: The "Follow Us" row no longer includes an item labeled "X" / "X (Twitter)" and does not render the X icon.
A YouTube icon/link is present in the same position/group as the other social icons.
Clicking the YouTube icon opens https://youtube.com/@myplaceatqueretaro?si=FI8rt31Wp4dxLMY2 in a new tab.
The YouTube link uses safe external link attributes (target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer").
The YouTube link has an accessible aria-label indicating "YouTube" (or equivalent clear label).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not introduce additional backend services or external databases; this change must be frontend-only.
nonGoals: Do not change any other social links (e.g., Facebook, Instagram) beyond replacing the X link.
Do not redesign the Contact section layout or styling; keep existing spacing, sizing, and hover/focus behavior.
Do not add or change backend logic; no Motoko changes required.
